name: Battery Run
description:
Battery Run is a 2.5D side-scrolling game (made with Unity) where your goal is to run and jump till the end, before your battery runs out.

This is my first Ludum Dare game. I had quite a limited time making it, so lots of gameplay ideas had to be cut. At the end, I had only about 10 minutes to implement the audio, so game has only one sound effect :(

But I still had a fun time making it, and I am hopefully able participate in the upcoming Ludum Dares.

List of fixes for Battery Run version 1.0.1:

  • Adjusted some sprite and text box sizes
  • Slightly reduced the battery drain speed
  • Expanded the area of the finish trigger
